response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. We believe its true value far exceeds $12,000, but considering your potential needs and benefits, we're willing to offer it to you at this exclusive price. By accepting this offer, you'll be securing a piece that promises to serve you well for years to come. Let's make this opportunity yours today!", "product_price": 15000}
